item.title: Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, Jan 13, 2025 predicts exploring new paths - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, Jan 13, 2025 to know your astrological predictions

Date: Jan 13, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Today, Pisces might find unexpected opportunities and refreshing encounters. It's a good day to connect emotionally with others and explore new paths.

  • Anticipate unexpected chances and emotional connections.
  • Positive interactions can lead to significant changes.
  • In love, chances to deepen connections or meet someone new are present.
  • Career opportunities may arise unexpectedly; networking is beneficial.
  • Financial planning is advised; avoid impulsive decisions.
  • Health requires balance between activity and rest.
"By keeping an open mind, you may find the day filled with rewarding experiences that contribute positively to your journey."

In conclusion, being receptive and open to new experiences can lead to personal growth and positive changes in various aspects of life today.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Chahat Pandey evicted, fans say 'she deserved to be in top 5 instead of Chugli gang' - DNA India
item.description:
Chahat Pandey Evicted from Bigg Boss 18: Fans React

Publication Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: DNA India

Chahat Pandey has been evicted from Bigg Boss 18, leaving seven contestants vying for the title. Fans express disappointment over her departure, believing she deserved a spot in the top five over the current 'Chugli gang'.

  • After Shrutika Arjun's eviction, Chahat's elimination occurs just before the finals.
  • Remaining contestants: Karan Veer Mehra, Avinash Mishra, Vivian Dsena, Eisha Singh, Rajat Dalal, Chum Darang, and Shilpa Shirodkar.
  • Viewers criticized the eviction, calling it unfair and biased.
  • The Grand Finale is set for January 19, 2025, with more evictions anticipated next week.
“Chahat deserved to be in top 5 instead of Chugli gang,” remarked an Instagram user.

The upcoming finale promises to be exciting with significant remaining contestants as they vie for victory in the highly popular reality show.

item.title: Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 3 (Early Trends): Concludes Opening Weekend In The Vicinity Of 25 Crores, All Eyes On Sankranti Holiday! - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 3 (Early Trends)

Publication Date: January 14, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Ram Charan and Kiara Advani's film, Game Changer, had a promising start but has seen a decline in box office collections as it concludes its opening weekend.

  • The film collected approximately 7.80-8.20 crores on Day 3, showing about a 7-3% drop from Day 2's 8.43 crores.
  • Total collections for the opening weekend stand between 24.87-25.27 crores.
  • Despite a strong opening, the film's performance is falling short compared to other regional releases, particularly Devara.

“Box office numbers are based on estimates and various sources. Numbers have not been independently verified by Koimoi.”

As the Sankranti holiday approaches, there could be an uptick in viewership, but the film’s fate will depend on its performance during the regular working days that follow.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj success party: Balayya kisses Bobby - 123telugu
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj success party: Balayya kisses Bobby

Published on Jan 12, 2025 | Source: 123Telugu

Daaku Maharaaj has taken a solid start at the box office, and the team is overwhelmed with the response, celebrating the success with a party in Hyderabad.

  • Director Bobby shared a viral picture of Balayya kissing him, showcasing their joy over the film’s success.
  • Naga Vamsi produced the film on a grand scale.
  • Balakrishna's unique avatar in the film has won the hearts of many.
“It’s no surprise that the team is celebrating in style.”

With its great start at the box office, Daaku Maharaaj not only sets a precedent for future projects but also highlights the synergy between the cast and crew.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection day 3: Ram Charan, Shankar film beats Kamal Haasan's Indian 2, earns Rs... - DNA India
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 3: Ram Charan, Shankar film beats Indian 2

Publication Date: January 13, 2025

Source: DNA India

Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan and directed by Shankar, has surpassed the lifetime domestic earnings of the previous film Indian 2, grossing close to Rs 90 crore in its opening week.

  • Game Changer was released on January 10, 2025, and had a strong opening, collecting Rs 51 crore on its first day.
  • The film saw a drop to Rs 21.60 crore on its second day, totaling Rs 72.60 crore after two days.
  • On its third day, it earned Rs 16.33 crore, raising its total earnings near Rs 90 crore.
  • Game Changer has reportedly outperformed Indian 2, which earned Rs 82 crore net in India and grossed Rs 148 crore worldwide.
  • The film is made under a budget of Rs 250 crore and marks Shankar's Telugu cinema debut.
  • It will compete with other releases, including Daaku Maharaaj, which opened on January 12.
“Game Changer marks a significant entry for Shankar in Telugu cinema, showcasing the commercial viability of the film.”

In conclusion, Game Changer's successful opening reflects its appeal and strong box office performance against a backdrop of competitive releases.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna reveals media misquoted his statement about Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna reveals media misquoted his statement about Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff

Publication Date: Unknown Source: Unknown

Mukesh Khanna addressed a misinterpretation of his comments concerning Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff, clarifying the actual context of his statements.

  • Khanna expressed his surprise at the media's portrayal of his words.
  • He emphasized his respect for both Amitabh Bachchan and Tiger Shroff.
  • Khanna mentioned the need for accurate reporting to avoid misunderstandings.
“It's important that we don't misquote each other in the media.”

In conclusion, Khanna's response highlights the ongoing issue of media representation and miscommunication.

item.title: When Jaya Bachchan spoke out on Amitabh Bachchan’s rumoured affair with Rekha and if she’d mind them working together again: ‘My life would have been hell if…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Jaya Bachchan Reflects on Amitabh's Rumored Affair with Rekha

Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Despite being married for over 50 years, Jaya Bachchan shares her thoughts on the long-standing rumors regarding her husband Amitabh Bachchan and actress Rekha.

  • Gossip about Amitabh's relationship with Rekha persists despite their denials.
  • Jaya stated she would not object to Amitabh and Rekha working together, but acknowledges it would create a sensational atmosphere.
  • Her advice for maintaining a lasting marriage includes trust and not becoming overly possessive.
  • Amitabh and Rekha, celebrated on-screen partners, have not worked together for 43 years since their film Silsila.
“My life would have been hell if I had taken it all seriously. We are made of sterner stuff.” - Jaya Bachchan

Jaya Bachchan’s insights reveal her strong character and understanding of the complexities of relationships in the film industry.

item.title: Game Changer worldwide box office collection Day 2: Ram Charan’s film sees massive dip, collects Rs 72.5 crore - The Indian Express
item.description:
Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 2: Major Dip Observed

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: Indian Express

The latest release, Game Changer starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has seen a significant decline in its box office collection on the second day. Initial excitement is overshadowed by disappointing figures.

  • The film made a total of Rs 72.5 crore in its first two days.
  • Day 1 collection was reported at Rs 51 crore across all languages.
  • Day 2 saw a drastic drop, earning only Rs 21.5 crore.
  • There was a 57.84% dip in collections on Day 2.
  • Discrepancies in reported earnings have raised concerns about inflated numbers.
The king’s arrival is setting the box office ablaze 🤙🏼 #GameChanger takes a blockbuster opening at the BOX OFFICE 💥💥 GROSSES 186 CRORES WORLDWIDE on Day 1 ❤‍🔥— Game Changer (@GameChangerOffl)

The decline in box office performance suggests a lack of audience reception, and scrutiny over the film’s reported earnings continues.

item.title: Salman Khan recalls Raveena Tandon fighting with him on-set, reacts to Rasha and Aman’s debut: ‘Main wahi ka wahi hoon’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Salman Khan Recalls On-Set Memories with Raveena Tandon on Bigg Boss 18

Date: January 12, 2025
Source: The Indian Express

The latest episode of Bigg Boss 18 featured Salman Khan welcoming debut actors Rasha Thadani and Aman Devgan, and a heartfelt reunion with Raveena Tandon.

  • Salman Khan humorously reflected on his unchanged status while welcoming the newcomers.
  • Raveena Tandon reminisced about her past experiences with Salman, sparking humor on their on-set fights.
  • Throwback images showcased Salman and a young Rasha, evoking nostalgic moments.
  • The episode also included anecdotes about their time in the 1990s and playful banter.
“It’s hard to believe that you guys have become a hero and heroine aur main wahi ka wahi (and I’m still the same).” - Salman Khan

This episode highlights the amusing and emotional connections among these Bollywood actors, reflecting the enduring nature of their friendships.

item.title: Preity Zinta shares her family is ‘safe as of now’ amid LA wildfires: ‘I never thought I would live to see a day where…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Preity Zinta shares her family is ‘safe as of now’ amid LA wildfires: ‘I never thought I would live to see a day where…’

Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

Amid the raging wildfires in Los Angeles, Bollywood star Preity Zinta shared an update about her family, assuring fans they are ‘safe as of now’ and voicing her heartbreak over the devastation in the region.

  • Preity Zinta expressed her feelings on social media regarding the wildfires affecting Los Angeles.
  • She described the situation as devastating, with ash falling like snow and many friends and family members under evacuation orders.
  • She expressed gratitude to the fire department and firefighters for their efforts in saving lives and properties.
  • Other celebrities like Nora Fatehi and Priyanka Chopra also shared their experiences regarding the wildfires.
“I never thought I would live to see a day where fires would ravage neighbourhoods around us in LA.” - Preity Zinta

The California wildfires have caused widespread destruction, impacting numerous individuals, including several high-profile celebrities. Many homes have been destroyed, and others have been hastily evacuated.

item.title: Game Changer and Daaku Maharaaj done – All eyes on Sankranthiki Vasthunnam - 123telugu

Sankranthiki Vasthunnam is all set to hit the screens on January 14, 2025, and there is solid buzz surrounding this film, directed by Anil Ravipudi. The film is being released as a Sankranthi special.

  • The songs from the film have been well-received and have gained popularity.

"All the film needs now is a positive talk to solidify its success."

As anticipation grows, we await to see how much the film will collect in its opening weekend.

item.title: Ajith Kumar’s racing team emerges 3rd in Dubai 24H 2025; R Madhavan, Sivakarthikeyan, Udhay Stalin, others congratulate - Mint
item.description:
Ajith Kumar’s Racing Team Secures Third Place in Dubai 24H 2025

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

Tamil superstar Ajith Kumar made a remarkable return to racing, leading his team to a third-place finish in the 24H Dubai 2025 endurance race.

  • Ajith Kumar Racing secured victory in the 991 category and was recognized for the Spirit of the Race in the GT4 category.
  • The team celebrated their wins with the Indian flag as fans cheered on.
  • R Madhavan, Udhay Stalin, and others publicly congratulated Ajith Kumar on social media.
  • Ajith Kumar shared a heartfelt moment with his wife after his victory.
“So so proud.. what a man. The one and only. Ajith Kumar,” - R Madhavan

Ajith Kumar's achievements in the race serve as an inspiration, showcasing his dedication and passion for the sport.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj Hindi and Tamil versions to be out on this date - 123telugu
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Hindi and Tamil Versions Release Date Announced

Published on: Jan 12, 2025 8:30 pm IST

Daaku Maharaaj has started on a strong note at the box office. The team is super thrilled with the output and believes that the action drama will achieve big numbers in the days to come.

  • The Hindi and Tamil releases were delayed due to technical issues.
  • Producer Naga Vamsi stated that the release is planned for January 17, 2025, subject to the completion of censor formalities.
  • The film features direction by Bobby Kolli and music by Thaman.
  • Key roles are played by Urvashi Rautela, Shraddha Srinath, and Pragya Jaiswal.
“If the censor formalities are completed on time, we plan to release the Tamil and Hindi versions on January 17, 2025.” - Naga Vamsi

Stay tuned for updates on the box office collections of this film in the coming days.

item.title: Ex-band member of Fossils found hanging - The Times of India
item.description:
Ex-band member of Fossils found hanging

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

A member of the famous band Fossils has been discovered hanging, shocking fans and the music community alike.

  • The incident raised many questions regarding the circumstances leading to the member's demise.
  • Fans expressed their grief and support on social media platforms.
  • The band has been a significant part of the regional music scene for years, with a loyal fanbase.
“This is devastating news for all of us who loved their music,” said a fan.

The news has left fans and fellow musicians in deep sorrow, prompting an outpouring of tributes across various media.

item.title: Telugu actor Rana Daggubati, family members booked over Deccan Kitchen Hotel demolition: Report - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Rana Daggubati and Family Face Legal Action Over Hotel Demolition

Published: 12 January 2025 | Source: Hyderabad News

A case has been filed against Telugu actor Rana Daggubati and several family members, including actor Venkatesh Daggubati, over the demolition of a hotel in Hyderabad that was run by a businessman on land leased from the Daggubati family.

  • The FIR was registered under IPC sections like criminal conspiracy and house trespass.
  • The complainant, who has a pending lawsuit regarding the lease, claims the family unlawfully demolished the hotel structure.
  • The incident prompted a court directive for police investigation.
"The Daggubati family had leased the premises in 2014, and the complainant alleges that they tried to unlawfully remove him from the property."

The case is ongoing, with police investigations being conducted following the court's instructions.

item.title: Mukesh Khanna reacts to Amitabh Bachchan's alleged remark, 'saala copy karta hai' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna reacts to Amitabh Bachchan's alleged remark, 'saala copy karta hai'

Publication Date: October 20, 2023   Source: Times of India

Mukesh Khanna has recently responded to alleged remarks made by Amitabh Bachchan, stating that he copies his work. This article delves into Khanna's reactions and perspectives on the matter.

  • The comments were made during a promotional event.
  • Khanna expressed surprise and disappointment over the remarks.
  • He emphasized his own originality in his work.
“I have always strived to create unique content,” Khanna stated.

Khanna urges for respect and recognition for individual creativity in the entertainment industry.

item.description:
Boney Kapoor shares throwback photo with Sridevi; says ‘true love cannot be hidden’. See pic

Boney Kapoor, film producer and husband of the late Sridevi, shared a nostalgic throwback photo on social media expressing how much he misses her, with a caption stating, 'True love cannot be hidden.'

  • Boney frequently shares memories of Sridevi on social media.
  • His recent post included a touching image of the couple smiling at each other.
  • The post quickly garnered attention and emotional responses from fans.
  • Boney previously inaugurated a chowk in Mumbai in Sridevi’s honor.

“True love cannot be hidden.” - Boney Kapoor

This heartfelt post showcases the lasting legacy of Sridevi and the profound impact she had on both her family and fans. Boney's tribute underscores the love they shared, even after her passing.

item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Netizens slam Salman Khan, makers for wrongly targeting Karan Veer Mehra, say 'script fail ho gaya'

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: DNA India

In a recent episode of Bigg Boss 18, Salman Khan faced backlash from netizens for allegedly setting false narratives against contestant Karan Veer Mehra.

  • Salman Khan questioned Karan about his participation in the Ticket To Finale task.
  • Karan struggled to get his points across as Salman frequently interrupted him.
  • Viewers expressed their discontent on social media, labeling it the worst Weekend Ka Vaar episode.
  • Many users accused Salman of spreading lies and called Karan the smartest contestant this season.
“Salman either didn't do his homework or makers felt the hype surrounding Karan Veer Mehra has damaged the confidence of other contestants.” - A netizen's take.

The ongoing season is nearing its finale, which is scheduled for January 19. The concluding week will feature a total of seven contestants trying to secure their spot for the grand finale.

item.title: ‘Saala copy karta hai’: Mukesh Khanna recalls Amitabh Bachchan’s remark that ‘stayed’ with him - The Indian Express
item.description:
Mukesh Khanna Reflects on Amitabh Bachchan's Remark About Copying

Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

Mukesh Khanna recently shared an anecdote regarding a comment made by Amitabh Bachchan that impacted him deeply. Despite the notion that Amitabh’s words influenced his career, Khanna clarified that he has remained unfazed by such perceptions.

  • Mukesh Khanna recalled a time when he was accused of imitating Amitabh Bachchan.
  • Amitabh's friend allegedly overheard him say, 'Saala copy karta hai' about Khanna.
  • Khanna expressed disbelief that Amitabh would say such a thing.
  • Media suggested Amitabh's remark 'finished his career,' which Khanna dismissed.
  • He clarified that Amitabh did not influence his film choices or career trajectory.
“I starred in a few films because I signed only a few films. Amitabh didn’t stop me from starring in Mahabharat or Shaktimaan.”

In conclusion, Mukesh Khanna remains confident in his career choices and dismisses the idea that a single comment from Amitabh Bachchan defined his professional path.

item.title: Anushka Sharma, Virat Kohli's son Akaay Kohli makes his first appearance, video goes viral - India.com
item.description:
Virat Kohli, Anushka Sharma's son Akaay makes his first 'public' appearance, watch viral video

Publication Date: January 12, 2025
Source: India.com

The first glimpse of Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli's son Akaay Kohli has surfaced online, as the couple's private life has generally kept their children away from the media.

  • The couple recently visited Vrindavan, where a video of their outing went viral, revealing their son Akaay's face to the public.
  • Akaay, who will turn one year old on February 15, 2025, has generally been kept out of the limelight, making this appearance significant.
  • Despite the couple's efforts to maintain privacy, a paparazzi shot captured Akaay, sparking widespread affection and praise on social media.
“Akaay is even cuter than Taimur and Rhea,” commented an excited user.

The video was later removed to respect the family's privacy.

item.title: Rana Daggubati, Venkatesh and family members booked over Hyderabad hotel demolition - The News Minute
item.description:
Family of Actors Venkatesh and Rana Daggubati Face Legal Action Over Hotel Demolition in Hyderabad

Published on: 12 Jan 2025, 12:19 pm

Hyderabad police have registered a case against actors Venkatesh and Rana Daggubati along with their family members regarding the demolition of the Deccan Kitchen Hotel.

  • The Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation had partially demolished the hotel in November 2022.
  • The complete demolition of the structure was executed by the Daggubati family in January 2024.
  • A First Information Report (FIR) lists multiple Daggubati family members as accused, including Daggubati Suresh, Daggubati Venkatesh, Daggubati Rana, and Daggubati Abhiram.
  • The case is under various sections of the Indian Penal Code for house-trespass and criminal conspiracy.
  • A court directed the police to take action based on a complaint by Nanda Kumar, who alleges illegal demolition despite a court injunction.
  • Kumar claims to have suffered a loss of Rs 20 crore due to the actions of the Daggubati family.
Nanda Kumar claims to have suffered a loss of Rs 20 crore due to the demolition and vandalism.

This legal action highlights the ongoing disputes over property and legal compliance in urban development scenarios in Hyderabad.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection day 3: Ram Charan-Shankar film crosses Indian 2 lifetime, mints over ₹88 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 3: Shankar's Telugu debut film is not performing as expected, given that this is just its first week.

Jan 12, 2025 - Hindustan Times

The film Game Changer, directed by Shankar and starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has crossed the lifetime collection of Indian 2, grossing ₹88.93 crore in its opening weekend, although it is not performing as strongly as expected.

  • The film collected ₹16.33 crore on its third day.
  • On opening day, it earned ₹51 crore but saw a significant drop of 57.65% on day two, earning ₹21.6 crore.
  • Occupancy rates have also seen declines, particularly for the Telugu version.
  • The overall performance is being closely observed with competition from other new releases.
“Game Changer tells the story of an IAS officer called Ram Nandan, linking his story to an activist called Appanna.”

Despite its impressive opening, the film's future box office performance remains uncertain as competition heats up in its subsequent weeks.
